snippet: Denmark thought they had earned a valuable point at home to Portugal in their Euro 2016 group I clash in Copenhagen on Tuesday but Cristiano Ronaldo popped up in stoppage time to deny both gravity and the Danes....
lead_paragraph: Denmark thought they had earned a valuable point at home to Portugal in their Euro 2016 group I clash in Copenhagen on Tuesday but Cristiano Ronaldo popped up in stoppage time to deny both gravity and the Danes.
